contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced|date=December 2009}} {{Coord|18|0|51.29|N|88|32|32.77|W|display=title}} {{Infobox settlement |official_name = Carmelita |image_skyline = |imagesize = 300px |image_caption = |image_flag = |image_seal = |pushpin_map = Belize |pushpin_mapsize = 300 |map_caption = Map of Corozal metropolitan area |coordinates_region = BZ |subdivision_type = [[List of countries|Country]] |subdivision_name = {{Flag|Belize}} |subdivision_type1 = [[Districts of Belize|District]] |subdivision_name1 = [[Orange Walk District]] |subdivision_type2 = |subdivision_name2 = |leader_title = |leader_name = |established_title = |established_date = |area_magnitude = |area_total_km2 = |area_total_sq_mi = |area_land_km2 = |area_land_sq_mi = |area_water_km2 = |area_water_sq_mi = |area_water_percent = |area_urban_km2 = |area_urban_sq_mi = |area_metro_km2 = |area_metro_sq_mi = |population_as_of = |population_note = |population_total = |population_density_km2 = |population_density_sq_mi = |population_metro = |population_density_metro_km2 = |population_density_metro_sq_mi = |population_urban = |timezone = [[Central Time zone|Central]] |utc_offset = -6 |timezone_DST = |utc_offset_DST = |latd=18 |latm=0 |lats=51 |latNS=N |longd=88 |longm=32|longs=33 |longEW=W |elevation_m = |elevation_ft = |website = |footnotes = }} '''Carmelita''' is a [[village]] in the [[Orange Walk District]] of the nation of [[Belize]]. According to the 2000 census, it had a population of 1,269 people. [[Category:Populated places in Belize]] {{Belize-geo-stub}}
